passages.title: Morning at the Plaza
passages.text: Learners gather around the plaza before class. The sari-sari store opens early, and a jeepney waits for passengers heading to school.
passages.question: Why do learners arrive early at the plaza?
options: They need to catch the jeepney together.
They want to buy lunch immediately.
They are waiting for rain to stop.

passages.title: Rainy Day Story
passages.text: Kuya Jun is a young fisher who writes short notes about the weather. When dark clouds arrive, he reminds his siblings to review lessons indoors.
passages.question: What does Kuya Jun do when the sky turns dark?
options: He writes about the weather and stays inside.
He sells snacks at the market.
